---
id: cache-redis
title: Redis Cache
sidebar_label: Redis
---

This caching strategy will use your Redis instance as the storage.

To get started with this caching strategy, install it:

<PackageInstall packages="@graphql-mesh/cache-redis" />

## How to use?

```yaml
cache:
    redis:
        host: localhost
        port: 9876
        password: MY_SECRET_PASSWORD
```
